mapper.select: select id from park where name = #{param1}
select * from park where name like #{param1} or position like #{param1}
select * from park where type=3 and streetId=#{streetId}

select park.id, park.name, park.portCount, park.channelCount, portLeftCount, feeCriterion.name as feeCriterionName, feeCriterion.id as feeCriterionId, park.status, park.isFree, park.floor, park.type, park.longitude, park.latitude, park.alias, park.mapAddr, park.position, park.date, park.contact, park.number, park.pictureUri, park.description,park.streetId,street.name as streetName from park left join feeCriterion on park.feeCriterionId = feeCriterion.id left join street on street.id=park.streetId order by id limit #{low}, #{count}

select park.id, park.name, park.portCount, park.channelCount, portLeftCount, feeCriterion.name as feeCriterionName, feeCriterion.id as feeCriterionId, park.status, park.isFree, park.floor, park.type, park.longitude, park.latitude, park.alias, park.mapAddr, park.position, park.date, park.contact, park.number, park.pictureUri, park.description,park.streetId,street.name as streetName from park left join feeCriterion on park.feeCriterionId = feeCriterion.id left join street on street.id=park.streetId where park.type=3 order by id limit #{low}, #{count}
select * from park where park.position like '%${param1}%'
select count(*) from park where type=3
select * from park order by id desc limit 1;
mapper.insert:
insert into park
id,
streetId,
name,
portCount,
channelCount,
portLeftCount,
feeCriterionId,
status,
isFree,
floor,
type,
position,
date,
isDeleted,
longitude,
latitude,
alias,
mapAddr,
contact,
number,
description,
pictureUri,

#{streetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{portCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{channelCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{portLeftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{feeCriterionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{position,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{pictureUri,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update park
streetId = #{streetId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
portCount = #{portCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channelCount = #{channelCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
portLeftCount = #{portLeftCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
feeCriterionId = #{feeCriterionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isFree = #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
position = #{position,jdbcType=CHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDeleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapAddr = #{mapAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=CHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=CHAR},
pictureUri = #{pictureUri,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update park set portLeftCount = #{portLeftCount} where id = #{id}
